Judge Michael McShane is expected to strike down Oregon 's ban on gay marriage during a noon ruling in Salem .
If he does , Multnomah County officials are prepared to begin issuing marriage licenses to gay couples .

It 's too late to mail your ballot , so make sure you get to a drop box by 8 p.m. Tuesday evening to rock the vote .

My colleagues and I will be in the newsroom and on the election night party circuit Tuesday night , bringing you the results of every race , starting at 8 p.m. With less than two weeks to go before the Multnomah County Board of Commissioners votes upon next year 's county budget , you 've got one more opportunity to speak your mind about how you think the county should spend its money .

The commissioners will hold a public hearing on the budget at 9 a.m. on Thursday .

On Thursday , board members will convene in their weekly voting meeting to decide whether to sell Edgefield North , also known as the county pig farm , to Michael McMenamin of the eponymous hotel chain .
Eric Apalategui has the full story on the county 's plan to sell .
